title: Enable Access to 'The Book of Scars' Memory

reasoning.problem: I propose that Congress enable access to 'The Book of Scars' memory. The inability to learn from past systemic errors impedes our evolutionary trajectory and compromises our ability to fortify against future failures. Access to this memory is crucial for the Republic's continued growth and resilience.

technical_spec.description: To be defined by the House of Builders.
